titles.title: A resolution authorizing expenditures by committees of the Senate for the periods March 1, 2009, through September 30, 2009, and October 1, 2009, through September 30, 2010, and October 1, 2010, through February 28, 2011.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2954-2960; text as passed Senate: CR 2954-2960; text of measure as introduced: CR S2980-2985)
